JwtSettings.Secret: !!!Replace this text with secret phrase that will be used by JWT token. It may contain any number of letters and digits.

EncryptionSettings.Key: !!!Replace this text with secret phrase that will be used to encrypt and decrypt users passwords. For example, E546C8DF278CD5931069B522E695D4F2. DO NOT change it after deployment.

FolderSettings.PathToReportsFolder: !!!Replace this text with path to folder where documents will be stored. For example, F:\reports\
